text: DeepSeek V4 releases before NVDA earnings (Feb 25)
rationale: Multiple sources say mid-Feb, 1T params. Timing before NVDA would maximize narrative impact.

text: NVDA beats Q4 estimates but stock drops within 48h
rationale: High expectations baked in. Guidance > beat. Historical sell-the-news pattern.

text: Singapore Airshow announces major defense deal >1B USD
rationale: P-8A sale already announced. Big deals typically come on final days.

text: ST Engineering announces new satellite contract within 6 months of SG Space Agency launch
rationale: New agency + $200M govt commitment + equatorial positioning = ST Engineering is the obvious beneficiary. They already co-own 3 satellites.

text: MAS finalizes stablecoin regulatory framework by end of Q2 2026
rationale: MAS MD said Nov 2025 they are drafting legislation. SGB launching Q1 indicates regulatory clarity coming. Singapore wants to lead in regulated crypto.
